All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
Represents an account.
AccountDAO
Provides access to account data stored in the database.
AddBudgetDialog
Represents a custom dialog for adding a budget in the budget application.
AddExpenseDialog
Represents a custom dialog for adding an expense in the budget application.
AddIncomeDialog
Represents a custom dialog for adding an income in the budget application.
AddSavingsDepositDialog
Represents a custom dialog for adding an expense in the budget application.
AddSavingsPlanDialog
Represents a custom dialog for adding a savings plan in the budget application.
Budget
Represents a budget, contains a list of expenses, a list of incomes, and a list of categories.
BudgetController
Controller for the Budget GUI.
ConfirmationAlert
General alert for confirmation's.
DAO<T>
Data Access Object used to access data from a database.
ExceptionAlert
General alert for exceptions.
Expense
Represents an expense entry in the budget application.
ExpenseCategory
Represents the categories for expenses in the budget application.
Income
Represents an income entry in the budget application.
IncomeCategory
Represents the categories for incomes in the budget application.
LoginController
Controller for Login GUI.
Main
Main class for the BudgetApplication.
MoneyAction
Represents a money action in the budget application, serving as a superclass for Expense and Income classes.
PrimaryController
Represents the controller for the primary GUI.
PrimaryView
The view that is shown when the application launches.
RecurringType
Represents the recurring types of MoneyActions in the budget application.
RegisterNewAccountController
Controller class for registering new accounts in the budget application.
ResetPinCodeEnterNewPinCodeController
Controller for resetting the user's pin code by answering the security question.
ResetPinCodeEnterUserController
Represents the controller for the first view when resetting pin.
SavingsPlan
Represents a savings plan.
SavingsPlanController
This class is the controller for SavingsPlan GUI.
SecurityQuestion
The security questions that the users can choose from.
SessionAccount
Singleton class to hold the current session's account logged in to the application.
SettingsController
Represents the controller for the settings view.
WarningAlert
General alert for warnings.
